This vignette explains the evaluation functions. The vignette was build using R `r paste(R.Version()[6:7], collapse = ".")` with the ino `r utils::packageVersion("ino")` package.

```{r setup}
library(ino)
```

## The `optimization_time()` function

The `optimization_time()` function provides an overview of the optimization times with respect to the initialization strategies.

```{r, example optimization time}
x <- set_f(f = ino:::f_ackley, npar = 2)
x <- set_optimizer(x, "nlm")
x <- random_initialization(x, runs = 10)
# optimization_time(x)
```
